package.name: PHP_CodeSniffer_Standards_BestOfMedia
package.description: A set of rules and sniffers matching BestOfMedia symfony 1.4 coding standards
package.notes:
[2012-11-23] * Set violation severity to 0 for Generic.Functions.OpeningFunctionBraceKernighanRitchie.BraceOnNewLine (560902f) * Added a git changelog script. (e90209d) * Removed Generic.Functions.OpeningFunctionBraceBsdAllman.BraceSpacing and Generic.Functions.OpeningFunctionBraceBsdAllman.BraceOnSameLine from BestOfMedia standard (e677939) * Added test on DependencyInjection sniff (2394845) * Fixed AllSniffs.php test suite (654cd54)
[2012-11-20] * Added a sniffer that refuses singleton usage in non-static, non whitelisted class/methods (4fe3268) * Removed annoying Generic.Formatting.MultipleStatementAlignment.Incorrect from BestOfMedia standard. (c9276cb) * Fixed a bug preventing actions.class.php file with no parent sfActions to be scanned by SfActionsPerClassSniff. (ba36d56) * Fixed a bug where a sfActions with abstract function cycled to death. (ee4c644)

release.notes:
First release that bundles homemade Sniffs and Testing
Sniffs * Count executeXXX in sfActions or actions.class.php file. * Validate executeXXX formalism in sfActions or actions.class.php file.
